Text: does anyone know what happened to this, I've been trying to download it for 2 days, and have nothing

This is pointless.

1-You have to have MVP 2005 installed on your computer, this isn't a stand alone game.
2-You can get it free at MVPMods.com

Do I like this mod?  Absolutely.  Is uploading it to TPB useful?  Absolutely not.
